title: Team & Contact
description: PI’s Prof. Wolfgang Kiessling – Professor and Chair of Paleobiology/Paleoenvironments Prof. Manuel Steinbauer – Professor Lehrstuhl für Biogeografie – University of Bayreuth, Global Change Research, Universitätsstraße 30, D-95440 Bayreuth Team Dr Elizabeth (Liz) M. Dowding – current postdoc (BITE & IRAL, included in BioDeepTime and BigQuestions) Dr Barbara Seuss – Project Coordination/Administration M.Sc. text:
PI’s
Prof.
[Wolfgang Kiessling](https://www.gzn.nat.fau.eu/palaeontologie/team/professors/kiessling/) – Professor and Chair of Paleobiology/Paleoenvironments
Prof.
[Manuel Steinbauer](http://www.biogeo.uni-bayreuth.de/biogeo/de/mitarbeiter/mit/mitarbeiter_detail.php?id_obj=63446) – Professor Lehrstuhl für Biogeografie – University of Bayreuth, Global Change Research, Universitätsstraße 30, D-95440 Bayreuth
Team
Dr Elizabeth (Liz) M. Dowding – current postdoc (
[BITE](https://www.paleosynthesis.nat.fau.de/index.php/bite/) & [IRAL](https://www.paleosynthesis.nat.fau.de/index.php/iral/), included in BioDeepTime and BigQuestions)
Dr
[Barbara Seuss](https://www.gzn.nat.fau.eu/palaeontologie/team/wissenschaftler/seuss/) – Project Coordination/Administration
M.Sc.
[Anna Merkel ](https://www.gzn.nat.fau.de/palaeontologie/team/wissenschaftler/anna-merkel/)– Assistance project and app
Dr
[Adam Kocsis](https://www.gzn.nat.fau.de/palaeontologie/team/wissenschaftler/kocsis/) – App database & Science School
M.A.
[Cristina Krause](https://www.gzn.nat.fau.eu/palaeontologie/technisch/cristina-krause/) – App development
Michael Burger – App development, Softmatch, Erlangen
Questions? Get in contact and
[✉ mail ](mailto:pal-synthesis@fau.de)us
Friedrich-Alexander-University, GeoZentrum Nordbayern – Paleobiology, Loewenichstraße 28, D-91054 Erlangen
Former postdoc
Dr
[Jansen A. Smith](https://scse.d.umn.edu/faculty-staff/dr-jansen-smith-phd) ( [Big Questions](https://www.paleosynthesis.nat.fau.de/wp-admin/post.php?post=2193&action=edit), [BioDeepTime](https://www.paleosynthesis.nat.fau.de/index.php/biodeeptime/), [DDCP](https://www.paleosynthesis.nat.fau.de/index.php/ddcp/), [PaleoNov](https://www.paleosynthesis.nat.fau.de/index.php/paleonov/); will stay connected via [Big Questions](https://www.paleosynthesis.nat.fau.de/index.php/big-questions-in-paleontology/) and [BITE)](https://www.paleosynthesis.nat.fau.de/index.php/bite/)
